name: Hunt the keys
description:
YOU MUST PLAY ON FULL SCREEN (ON THE BOTTOM RIGHT OF THE GAME) OR THE UI IS BROKEN IF YOU WANT TO PLAY ON BROWSER

Our entry for the 2021 One Script Jam. Made by Pasora, CloudMonkey.

https://github.com/Mancur/OSJ-Game Link to GitHub repository.

Assets used:

https://opengameart.org/content/pixel-robot

https://opengameart.org/content/sci-fi-platformer-tileset

https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bebas+Neue 

https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/
